about: Experienced international Marketing & Sales Director with a demonstrated professional path in Automotive, Consumer goods and B2B industry. Skilled in Marketing Management, Product development, Business and Strategic Planning,  Sales Management, organizational turnarounds and operations. Management of P&L, projects and teams at international level. MBA graduated at SDA Bocconi.
experiences: Head of the Italian subsidiary of Jungheinrich AG, leader in Material Handling & Intralogistics Solutions (>1.000 people). Responsible for the legal entity, management of all aspects of the business and the P&L.

Development of new products in co-ordination with R&D and management of production planning with Supply Chain department.

Head of Marketing for RDC Region co-ordinating activities of all local subsidiaries (Russia, Eastern Europe countries, Turkey, India, Middle East and Africa, America): business plans, new product development, pricing, communication plans, support for M&A
